Articles.Content:
Hello.

For some reason I can not find the mod in the forum

I grew fond to the mod in 0.90 and would love to continue using it. I just hate how my science lab have ~0 science ready to transmit, then I go to Duna or something and between the burns I check and when I right click it spools from 0 to 499.

But the most annoying thing is when I have to operate a craft in the dark, drain 90% of the power, go somewhere else and it happens that next time (5-50 days later) I have to operate is still in the dark. Power is frozen at 10%, no matter that it did 5-50 rotations and took enough to fill it's batteries.

Please help me find it or let me know if the old version is compatible

Thanks in advance !

I guess this isn't really the right section for this question, since it's mod related, and there is a section for mods in the forums, but anyway, I'm not a Moderator, so I'll go ahead and overlook that...

In any way, a quick google search brought up this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97921-Background-Processing-0-2-KSP-0-25

[Moderator removed defunct website link]

I have no Idea whether it works with 1.0, and it doesn't seem there is a version for 1.0 of it.

It's really not that hard to find the mods you're looking for. Goolge is however a bit more efficient at actually showing you the forum thread you wanted than the forum search is.

Edited August 28, 2022 by James Kerman
link removed

I have no Idea whether it works with 1.0, and it doesn't seem there is a version for 1.0 of it.

It's really not that hard to find the mods you're looking for. Goolge is however a bit more efficient at actually showing you the forum thread you wanted than the forum search is.

Thank you! I guess it should be universal as it is a dll that works with the engine. Hope it works. I will use the one I used on 0.90 and see if it does work.
